page.title: 06 A SCHOOL SECRETARY, BRUTON
page.content: Miss Collins started work in 1950 as school secretary at Sexey's Schooland retired in1984.She said she enjoyed her work meeting all the new children that came to the school through out her years.She was able to work with five headmasters while she was at Sexey's. This school was not a complete boarding school as one third came daily and two thirds boarded as they mainly came from homes in Germany.There were three secretaries when Miss Collins left Miss Carpener, Mrs.Talyor and Mrs.Gardener that works in the sixth form center. Miss.Collins remembers the swimming pool being put up in the 1970's and was able to use it. She also remembers the old school hymn,which was brought in before 1900. The present hymn was introduced in the 1980s. She has seen many changes.
